subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: C. J. Watson had 16 points, including the game-tying 3-pointer at the end of regulation, and the host Chicago Bulls pulled away in overtime to beat the Miami Heat, 96-86.
snippet: C. J. Watson had 16 points, including the game-tying 3-pointer at the end of regulation, and the host Chicago Bulls pulled away in overtime to beat the Miami Heat, 96-86.
